rules.description: chunkwm

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --send-to-monitor prev
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --send-to-monitor next
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --warp  west
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --warp  south
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --warp  north
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --warp  east
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --use-temporary-ratio 0.03 --adjust-window-edge  west
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --use-temporary-ratio 0.03 --adjust-window-edge  south
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --use-temporary-ratio 0.03 --adjust-window-edge  north
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --use-temporary-ratio 0.03 --adjust-window-edge  east
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus west
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus south
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus north
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus east
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus next
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --focus prev
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::desktop --rotate 90
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --toggle fullscreen
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --toggle float
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::desktop --layout bsp
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::desktop --layout monocle
/usr/local/bin/chunkc tiling::window --close

rules.description: numpad
simultaneously keypress

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "switchWindow" in workflow "ru.mandrigin.alfred.sww" with argument ""'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "helpSearch" in workflow "com.tedwise.menubarsearch" with argument ""'

rules.description: Chrome Mode

to.shell_command: ~/local/bin/cliclick kd:ctrl c:+0,+0 ku:ctrl t:continue kp:return

rules.description: Mouse button 5 to define
Mouse button 4 to define
FILCO MINILA Swap grave_accent_and_tilde and backslash
FILCO MINILA Change left command to left option, and f18 if alone
FILCO MINILA Change left_option to f19 to left command, and 19 if alone
FILCO MINILA Change application to right option, and f17 when used alone
FILCO MINILA Change right option to right command, and f16 when used alone
HHKB, FILCO MINILA Change left control to esc if alone
Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone
Change right_command to command-tab when used alone
Change left_command to f19 if alone
Change left_option to f18 if alone
Change right_option to f15 if alone
Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 6)
Quick Insert Mode
Vi Mode [D as Trigger Key] (recommended)
Slash Mode
yq Launch Mode
